long_description: Add these Schwag Pockets to your tent for extra organizational space. Half nylon taffeta, half mesh construction combines durability with breathability and allows easy viewing of the contents. Round in shape, the opening is rigid for easy use; holds a Nalgene bottle, eye glasses or other small necessities. Hooks provide easy connection to interior tent webbing loops. Package contains two.
short_description: Add these Schwag Pockets to your tent for extra organizational space.
